alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 10:35PM MDT until April 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and gusty winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains...including U.S. Highway 191 and State Route 44. * WHEN...From noon Monday to midnight MDT Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult due to near zero visibility in blowing and drifting snow, and icy or snow- packed roads. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
